A true exploratory conversation will *mutate*—starting with crisp hypotheses and ending in a fog of nuance. This isn’t failure; it’s the sign you’ve engaged honestly. Early points will feel certain ("The Great Filter explains everything!"), then fracture under scrutiny ("Why no outliers?"). Don’t resist the dissolution.
